title: Create ocean conservation donation website

requirements.text: Create a homepage that introduces the mission of protecting marine life and sea animals, with compelling visuals and messaging about ocean conservation
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays clear mission statement about protecting sea animals and fish
Visually engaging layout that communicates urgency of ocean conservation
Navigation to other key sections of the site

requirements.text: Build an information section that educates visitors about threats to marine life, endangered sea animals, and the importance of ocean ecosystems
acceptanceCriteria: Content sections describing ocean conservation challenges
Information about endangered sea animals and fish
Educational content about marine ecosystems

requirements.text: Implement a donation form where users can select donation amounts and contribute to ocean conservation efforts
acceptanceCriteria: Donation form with preset amount options
Custom amount input field
Clear call-to-action buttons for donation submission

requirements.text: Create backend actor methods to record donation information including donor details and donation amounts for marine life conservation
acceptanceCriteria: Store donation records with amount and timestamp
Query methods to retrieve donation statistics
Data persistence across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Display a showcase of sea animals and marine species that benefit from conservation donations, with images and descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery or cards showing various sea animals and fish
Brief descriptions of each species and conservation status
Visual presentation of marine life diversity

requirements.text: Integrate donation form with backend to submit and confirm donation transactions
acceptanceCriteria: Form submission sends donation data to backend canister
Success confirmation displayed to user after donation
Error handling for failed submissions

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive ocean-themed visual design throughout the website with marine-inspired colors (ocean blues, teals, aqua greens), fluid typography, and wave-like design elements that evoke underwater environments and marine conservation
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette inspired by ocean and marine life
Typography and spacing that supports readability and theme
Design elements that reinforce ocean conservation message

requirements.text: Render generated ocean and marine life images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated
Images display correctly in relevant sections
Proper image paths and references throughout the application

constraints: Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Must use Motoko for backend canister
All backend logic in single main actor file
Generated images must be stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
nonGoals: Real payment processing integration with Stripe or other providers
